title: (x) Hil St. Soul - Pump (customized) {Mike Y}
content: I think this was made using Blippo Black or Pump. The 'h' is made from an 'l' attached to a reversed 's'. All the connections are added on. The tracking is closed so that letters touch. If you give me a few minutes, I can use Pump to show you what I mean.
author: bowfinpw

comments.content:
Here is the original lettering and a simulation done (crudely) using Pump Demi. I can see that there are rounded joins in the original. That's probably a bit beyond my skill with Illustrator, but probably not for a more accomplished professional. I think this is at least a close approximation. I used short line segments for the connections.   
 ![Hil St Soul Simulation](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053310im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49816.gif)
You can get Pump from any site that sells Letraset fonts, like MyFonts.com, Fonts.com or ITC, among others.
